NOTES (REMOVE or HIDE)

- Visit for examples: http://www.nbcnews.com/specials/donald-trump-first-100-days

- Adjust height of artboards as needed

- Mono for labels and annotations (11/15px #555, secondary #737373)

- Founders Condensed for headings (11/15px or 17/18px #555, secondary #737373)

- Publico Text for text copy (17/22px #555, secondary #737373)

- Highlight options: #a9e0d5, #feeac0 (defaults, use design’s color palette if applicable)

- 940px Art Board: widest

- 800px Art Board: wider

- 604px Art Board: well width

- 284px Art Board: required for mobile

- Delete artboards you don’t need
